PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SanitaryTerminalTypeWashHandBasin
PropertySetDef.Definition: Waste water appliance for washing the upper parts of the body. HISTORY: In IFC4, Material property removed. Use materials capabilities from IfcMaterialsResource schema. Datatype of color changed to IfcLabel (still a string value).

PropertyDef.Name: DrainSize
PropertyDef.Definition: The size of the drain outlet connection from the object.

PropertyDef.Name: Mounting
PropertyDef.Definition: Selection of the form of mounting from the enumerated list of mountings where:-\X\0D \X\0D BackToWall: \X\09A pedestal mounted sanitary terminal that fits flush to the wall at the rear to cover its service connections.\X\0D Pedestal: \X\09A floor mounted sanitary terminal that has an integral base\X\0D CounterTop: \X\09A sanitary terminal that is installed into a horizontal surface that is installed into a horizontal surface. Note: When applied to a wash hand basin, the term more normally used is \X2\2018\X0\vanity\X2\2019\X0\. See also Wash Hand Basin Type specification.\X\0D WallHung: \X\09A sanitary terminal cantilevered clear of the floor.

PropertyDef.Name: MountingOffset
PropertyDef.Definition: For counter top mounted basins the vertical offset between the top of the sink and the counter top.

PropertyDef.Name: WashHandBasinType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the types of wash hand basin that may be specified where:\X\0D \X\0D \X\0D DentalCuspidor: Waste water appliance that receives and flushes away mouth washings\X\0D .\X\0D HandRinse: Wall mounted wash hand basin that has an overall width of 500mm or less\X\0D .\X\0D Hospital: Wash hand basin that has a smooth easy clean surface without tapholes or overflow slot for use where hygiene is of prime importance. \X\0D \X\0D Tipup: Wash hand basin mounted on pivots so that it can be emptied by tilting.\X\0D \X\0D Vanity: Wash hand basin for installation into a horizontal surface.\X\0D \X\0D Washfountain: Wash hand basin that is circular, semi-circular or polygonal on plan, at which more than one person can wash at the same time.\X\0D WashingTrough: Wash hand basin of elongated rectangular shape in plan, at which more than one person can wash at the same time.
